languages.text: Драгоценные камни, которые эльдары клана Азуриани носят на своей груди. В момент смерти эльдара камень впитывает его душу, не давая ей уйти в варп и попасть к Богу Хаоса Слаанешу, величайшему врагу эльдаров.

Precious psychoreactive crystals worn by living Asuryani as a means of sanctuary against the predations of Slaanesh. They begin as waystones whose purpose is to capture their wearer's soul at the moment of death, thus becoming spirit stones.
languages.original_text: Драгоценные камни, которые эльдары клана Азуриани носят на своей груди. В момент смерти эльдара камень впитывает его душу, не давая ей уйти в варп и попасть к Богу Хаоса Слаанешу, величайшему врагу эльдаров.

traits.locale_text: Precious stones that the Aeldari of the Asuryani clan wear on their chests. In the moment when the Aeldari wearer dies, the stone absorbs their soul, stopping it from passing into the warp and reaching the Chaos God Slaanesh, the greatest enemy of the Aeldari.

Precious stones that the Aeldari of the Asuryani clan wear on their chests. In the moment when the Aeldari wearer dies, the stone absorbs their soul, stopping it from passing into the warp and reaching the Chaos God Slaanesh, the greatest enemy of the Aeldari.

Precious stones that the Aeldari of the Asuryani branch wear on their chests. At the moment when the Aeldari wearer dies, the stone absorbs their soul, stopping it from passing into the warp and reaching the Chaos God Slaanesh, the greatest enemy of the Aeldari.

Precious stones that the Aeldari of the Asuryani branch wear on their chests. At the moment when the Aeldari wearer dies, the stone absorbs their soul, stopping it from passing into the warp and reaching the Chaos God Slaanesh, the greatest enemy of the Aeldari.

Precious psychoreactive crystals worn by living Asuryani as a means of sanctuary against the predations of Slaanesh. They begin as waystones whose purpose is to capture their wearer's soul at the moment of death, thus becoming spirit stones.

languages.text: Wertvolle psychoreaktive Kristalle, die von lebenden Asuryani als Schutz vor den Angriffen des Slaanesh getragen werden. Sie beginnen als Wegsteine, deren Zweck es ist, die Seele ihres Trägers im Moment des Todes einzufangen und zu Seelensteinen zu werden.
languages.original_text: Precious psychoreactive crystals worn by living Asuryani as a means of sanctuary against the predations of Slaanesh. They begin as waystones whose purpose is to capture their wearer's soul at the moment of death, thus becoming spirit stones.

traits.locale_text: Wertvolle psychoreaktive Kristalle, die von lebenden Asuryani als Schutz vor den Angriffen des Slaanesh getragen werden. Sie beginnen als Wegsteine, die die Seele ihres Trägers im Moment des Todes einfangen und so zu Geistersteinen werden.

languages.text: De précieux cristaux psychoréactifs, portés par les Asuryanis pour se protéger des prédations de Slaanesh. Il s'agit initialement de pierres gardiennes destinées à capturer l'âme de leur porteur au moment de sa mort. C'est alors seulement qu'elles deviennent des pierres-esprits.
languages.original_text: Precious psychoreactive crystals worn by living Asuryani as a means of sanctuary against the predations of Slaanesh. They begin as waystones whose purpose is to capture their wearer's soul at the moment of death, thus becoming spirit stones.

traits.locale_text: Précieux cristaux psychoréactifs portés par les Asuryani pour se protéger des prédations de Slaanesh. Au départ, il s'agit de pierres simples destinées à capturer l'âme de leur porteur au moment de sa mort, se transformant ainsi en pierres spirituelles.

languages.text: 方舟灵族佩戴的灵能反应水晶，极其珍贵。这种水晶可以保护他们的灵魂免遭色孽吞噬。灵魂石一开始是空的，当佩戴者死亡时，灵魂石会吸收佩戴者的灵魂，将其保护在水晶外壳之内。
languages.original_text: Precious psychoreactive crystals worn by living Asuryani as a means of sanctuary against the predations of Slaanesh. They begin as waystones whose purpose is to capture their wearer's soul at the moment of death, thus becoming spirit stones.

traits.locale_text: 方舟灵族佩戴的灵能反应水晶，极其珍贵。这种水晶可以保护他们的灵魂免遭色孽吞噬。灵魂石一开始是空的，当佩戴者死亡时，灵魂石会吸收佩戴者的灵魂，将其保护在水晶外壳之内。

languages.text: スラーネッシュの捕食に対抗する聖域として生きているアシュリヤーニが身に着けている、貴重な精神反応クリスタル。それらは、死の瞬間に着用者の魂を捕らえることを目的とした方位石として始まり、その後魂縛石となる。
languages.original_text: Precious psychoreactive crystals worn by living Asuryani as a means of sanctuary against the predations of Slaanesh. They begin as waystones whose purpose is to capture their wearer's soul at the moment of death, thus becoming spirit stones.

traits.locale_text: スラーネッシュの捕食に対抗する聖域として生きているアシュリヤーニが身に着けている、貴重な精神反応クリスタル。それらは、死の瞬間に着用者の魂を捕らえることを目的とした方位石として始まり、その後魂縛石となる。

languages.text: Cristales preciosos psicorreactivos que portan los Asuryani con vida para protegerse de las amenazas de Slaanesh. Empiezan siendo piedras del alma cuyo fin es absorber la de su portador en el momento de su muerte, pasando a ser joyas espirituales.
languages.original_text: Precious psychoreactive crystals worn by living Asuryani as a means of sanctuary against the predations of Slaanesh. They begin as waystones whose purpose is to capture their wearer's soul at the moment of death, thus becoming spirit stones.

traits.locale_text: Cristales preciosos psicorreactivos que portan los Asuryani con vida para protegerse de las amenazas de Slaanesh. Empiezan siendo piedras del alma, pero no absorben la de su portador hasta su muerte, momento en el que se convierten en joyas espirituales.
